website_summaries.verdict: Prized for its compact portability, Rowan can fold down to less than a third of its full size for transportation and storage.
pros: Stroller can be adjusted to accommodate infant car seat.Folds down quickly and easy  using Graco's signature design
Tires are air-filled to give you a smoother, more comfortable ride
Hood and visor help to guard against sun and drizzle
cons: Folds up well compared to other models, but some small customers may still struggle with it

customer_reviews.title: Not a jogging stroller
customer_reviews.text: This is not a jogging stroller anytime you attempt to jog or run without the wheel locked it immediately starts to shake. If you lock the front wheel it pulls to one direction or the other with no means to adjust the tracking. If you’re looking for a stroller to use around town or have bumpy sidewalks this is a great stroller. This is not a jogging stroller.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle Beranek

customer_reviews.title: Not good for jogging and noisy front wheel
customer_reviews.text: Front wheel is cheap material, it is noisy on uneven floors, and it is unstable and trembles even when it’s locked. When jogging that noise is even louder and it pulls to one side. Canopy could be bigger to properly protect from the sunlight.
customer_reviews.author: LRS

customer_reviews.title: Great Stroller, very durable
customer_reviews.text: I love the stroller it's made of high quality materials. I use it as a jogger stroller and it's so great. There are $600 jogger strollers in the market, this one is not probably in the same league, but it's still very solid. NOTE The car seat you get is not a Graco SnugRide 35 LX Infant Car Seat its a SnugRide 35 Lite LX , which is a much cheaper model, I can't say Im fond of it to be hoenst.
customer_reviews.author: Z

customer_reviews.title: Soft material. All terrain. Perfection
customer_reviews.text: Took me few videos on youtube to be able to assemble it but the results were good, the stroller is way bigger than expected and its wheels are huge hahahha. But is what i need to go for a walk/run something very stable. The material is soft. I removed the seat because i will be using the car chair for the few months and then i will install the chair again. I love it!!
customer_reviews.author: San & Van

customer_reviews.title: Gave the item as a gift, recipient is very happy
customer_reviews.text: The new mom who received the item stated that the item arrived in perfect condition and was easy to use. She feels the time will be very durable long term
customer_reviews.author: Kamacaru

customer_reviews.title: Ok jogger
customer_reviews.text: Pros: easy to assemble and car seat clicks on with ease Cons: heavy, gotta make sure the brake fully clicks into place or it will roll away
customer_reviews.author: karin kelemen

customer_reviews.title: Great jogger
customer_reviews.text: Not the lightest and most compact, but not what we were looking for in this stroller. It is very maneuverable, durable, safe, and easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: jeff binschus

customer_reviews.title: Click connect
customer_reviews.text: Love the stroller other than the top canopy portion doesn't stay extend over my baby it falls back against the handle when pushing the stroller it's clipped in properly but doesn't stay up and we liked that our click connect car seat would click right into it but when mothers have newborns they should have made it a little bit lighter but from a father's point of view it's good
customer_reviews.author: TYLER

customer_reviews.title: Great jogger!
customer_reviews.text: Great stroller!!! A bit bulky until you strip the wheels down :)
customer_reviews.author: Thezogs

customer_reviews.title: Great jogger
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy stroller with metal (not plastic) parts. We love the size of the wheels and the one-hand closing feature. Portable but not light given the quality materials.
customer_reviews.author: Geoffrey

customer_reviews.title: Great lightweight jogging stroller
customer_reviews.text: Little bulkier when folded up than hoped but can easily remove wheels to make it more compact.
customer_reviews.author: Sara Hartshorn

customer_reviews.title: Love the shade cover
customer_reviews.text: We are really enjoying this stroller. The shade cover is large enough to cover from sun, it’s easy to maneuver. It’s not the easiest to fold up, but for a jogger, this is great! I love the adjustable handlebar.
customer_reviews.author: Tmtra5

customer_reviews.title: Has It All
customer_reviews.text: Graco really thought of everything with this model. It checks all the boxes not just for jogging with your child but also for THEIR comfort. Even if you don't jog this is a great stroller. It features: * Large wheels with spring shock absorbers (albeit small ones) * ell padded seat compartment * Heavy duty joints where the very sturdy handle folds * Area in rear to stuff jackets, bluetooth speaker, etc. * Bottle holder in rear * An actual tray for your child! For small sippy cups, etc. * EASY to fold down. Some other models we've tried were very stiff. Excellent design, highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: PD

customer_reviews.title: A great stroller but heavy
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the best jogging strollers I've used. I didn't think having rubber wheels would make that much of a difference, but they absolutely do. It's a smoother ride for sure. The single axle front (lockable) makes steering much easier than strollers with two wheels in front. The only downside is that while the stroller folds down surprisingly flat, it is still quite heavy. If you don't need to lug it around, than it won't be an issue. The basket underneath is well-designed and roomy. The stroller as a whole feels high quality and durable. I would definitely recommend this stroller.
customer_reviews.author: Eskypades

customer_reviews.title: Graco Quality
customer_reviews.text: This is a good quality unit, perfect for a family with a new little one. As a jog stroller it is a cut above in quality and it really shines for trips and outings where convenience and space are priorities. It is sturdy yet easy to assemble and cleans up nicely. Very satisfied with this as I have been with all of the Graco baby products I have used in the past.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Bushman

customer_reviews.title: Nice jogging stroller
customer_reviews.text: The stroller can hold up to 50 pounds. This stroller has inflatable wheels also. When you are done with the stroller, it collapses to 30% of the size. That will now fit in most vehicles. What is nice, is you can collapse it in one second and its 27 pounds is light compared to others. The stroller, when folded also stands, so it isn't going to flop down to the floor. You can also add the Graco car set to have a complete travel system.
customer_reviews.author: CoCo's Mom

customer_reviews.title: Huge difference with rubber tires
customer_reviews.text: You can really feel the difference with the thick rubber tires when moving over bumpy surfaces, especially when jogging or walking uphill. Just gives it a lighter feel in my opinion and easier to push. It’s a rugged model that’s easy to set up so you can enjoy your outing more quickly. Seems to follow all the necessary safety guidelines. Handle is comfortable to hold onto. Plenty of pocket space! No problems getting child in and out of harness. No problems getting it folded up quickly. Easy to wipe off canvas areas. Simply spray off tires with a hose for quick cleaning. Great design.
customer_reviews.author: Christine K. Cornett-McVay

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: My son loves his jogger but I do wish the canopy was a bit more covering because it's hot here in Jamaica and the sun still catches him in there n a minor fault the jogger is built a little lean but other wise I love taking this out when am jogging n stuff
customer_reviews.author: Tashana

customer_reviews.title: Awesome jogging stroller
customer_reviews.text: This is a three wheeled, jogging stroll. The tires are air filled. Thy provide a really smooth ride. This stroller is lightweight and compact. When folded, it stands upright on the wheels, so it is easy to move about. It is easy to get your child in and out of this jogging stroller. You can be confident your child is safe and secure in this stroller.
customer_reviews.author: Tell It Like It Is

customer_reviews.title: Perfect compact jogger
customer_reviews.text: I've tested and used a lot of strollers. Joggers tend to be pretty weight and space-consuming. This one is one of the best compact joggers I've seen. It folds up a lot smaller than typical joggers and stands upright when folded. It's crazy easy to open/close, too. Lots of storage, and 3 handle positions for a comfortable fit or both mom and dad!
customer_reviews.author: Smartly Created

customer_reviews.title: Truly lightweight
customer_reviews.text: Yes, this jogger stroller is truly as compact and the seat is truly as lightweight as advertised. The maneuverability is somewhat better than other products of this kind, in my opinion. This is a very functional stroller, and it folds easily, which is the most important thing for me.
customer_reviews.author: Clarissa's Blog

customer_reviews.title: Beautifully designed and made
customer_reviews.text: If you are a jogger, this is a handy jogger stroller that is beautifully made. Graco does a great job designing strollers. The material is good and it is practical, easy to handle.
customer_reviews.author: Bold Consumer

product_meta.title: Graco FitFold Jogging Stroller, Rowan
product_meta.description: Style:FitFold Jogging Stroller| Color:RowanGraco FitFold Jogger Stroller folds down to 30% of its original size making it Graco's most compact folded jogging stroller. It also has a removable stroller seat to convert into a lightweight infant car seat carrier for more modes of use. The stroller has air-filled rubber tires for a smooth ride and features a one-hand, one-second fold. It also has an adjustable handle and multi-position reclining seat.
feature_bullets: Graco's most compact folded jogging stroller; folding reduces the size of the stroller by 70%
Remove the stroller seat for a lightweight, infant car seat carrier for more modes of use
Graco's signature FastAction one-second, one-hand fold provides the ultimate in convenience for parents on the go
Air-filled rubber tires provide a smooth ride on many terrains
Stroller stands when folded for easy storage

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars70 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
